resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105767</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085835</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Alternatives to the famous person report</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alternativen zum berühmten Personreport</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solutions de rechange à l'état célèbre de 
personne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alternativas ao relatório famoso da pessoa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alternative al rapporto famoso della persona</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εναλλακτικές λύσεις της διάσημης έκθεσης προσώπων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alternativas al informe famoso de la persona</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This "rethinking reports" series of articles provides alternative research assignments that challenge students to think critically about historical actors.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überdenkendes dieses "berichtet" Reihe über 
Artikel liefert alternative Forschung Anweisungen, die Kursteilnehmer 
herausfordern, an historische Schauspieler kritisch zu denken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ceci "qui repense enregistre" la série d'articles
fournit les affectations alternatives de recherches qui défient des 
étudiants de penser en critique aux acteurs historiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto "que rethinking relata" a série dos artigos 
fornece as atribuições alternativas da pesquisa que desafiam 
estudantes pensar crìticamente sobre atores históricos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò "che ripensa segnala" la serie di articoli 
fornisce le assegnazioni alternative di ricerca che sfidano gli 
allievi a pensare criticamente agli attori storici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η "επανεξέταση υποβάλλει έκθεση ότι" η σειρά 
άρθρων παρέχει τις εναλλακτικές ερευνητικές αναθέσεις που 
προκαλούν τους σπουδαστές για να σκεφτούν αυστηρά για τους 
ιστορικούς δράστες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto "que repiensa señala" la serie de artículos
proporciona a las asignaciones alternativas de la investigación que 
desafían a estudiantes a pensar críticamente de agentes históricos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105767</entry>
